resources.string: Need to restart the application to take effect

Waiting for timeout, please make sure your Root Manager is running in the background and try again! 

Please make sure you do not prevent the "Authorization Manager (SuperSu, Magisk Manager, etc.)" from starting up, and allow permissions such as background pop-up windows and floating windows. If the authorization dialog box never pops up, it is recommended to restart your phone and try again!
Sorry, ROOT permission was not obtained

Without ROOT permissions, many features will be lost. \nIf you miss the authorization prompt or do not see the pop-up window, please find your ROOT manager and manually set it to allow Scene to use ROOT permissions~
It seems that busybox is not installed on your phone, which will cause Scene to be unusable. Do you want to install it now (System modification is required)?
You should also try Scene. I think it’s pretty good. Download address:\n http://vtools.omarea.com/

Scene Enhanced Service
You need to activate this service to use the following functions:

1. Dynamic response (automatically adjust performance according to the foreground application).

2. Automatic behavior (when switching the screen or switching applications) Recycling process).

3. Automatic installation (automatically click Next when installing third-party applications)
Back up the currently used Boot as img and copy it to /sdcard/boot.img
Back up the currently used export Recovery as img and copy it to /sdcard/recovery.img
Export the DTBO partition as an img image and copy it to /sdcard/dtbo.img
Export the Persist partition as an img image and copy it to /sdcard/persist.img
/sdcard/%s.img already exists. Do you want to overwrite the existing file? \n
Insufficient storage space, please reserve at least 200M free space!
In the charging state, the screen-closing action is delayed until charging is completed.
Switch SELinux to permissive mode (some software calls [turn off Selinux]). The SeLinux state has no impact on the Scene, and turning on permissive mode may cause a crash and restart!
Use the system wallpaper as the window background and display a semi-transparent interface
Display the log of the Scene determination foreground application process
Display the function description prompt (question mark) icon next to the function item
Automatically end the process when an exception occurs during the running process to avoid stuck white screen
When an error occurs in Scene and crashes, click the button below to capture the log through logcat and send it to the developer to solve the problem.
When the system is in night mode, the Scene's resident notifications will be displayed with a black background (there is no need to turn this option on under normal circumstances)
Click here to activate auxiliary services
If you need to use the "Charging Speed ​​Regulation" and "Charging Protection" functions, be sure to keep the Scene running in the background!

The phone will decide whether to activate USB-PD charging based on compatibility, and no manual settings are required. Manual switching will cause slow charging, so manual modification is not allowed!
Not entering PD fast charging mode
OK, if you want this feature to automatically turn on after the phone restarts, please allow Scene to start automatically after booting!
The charging acceleration service is disabled. You may need to restart your phone to restore the default settings!
Adjust to slow charging when nearly full\n\nand actively reduce the charging speed at night
Stop charging after reaching the specified power level\n\nNote: Long-term use may cause the power display to be inaccurate.
Charging stops when it reaches %d%% and resumes when it falls below %d%%.

Adjust charging speed limit. There is no point in increasing the value crazily, because it will not achieve actual results. Please adjust the value within the effective range\n\nNote: The upper limit value is for reference only, please refer to the actual charging speed!
The system adjusts the upper limit of charging speed in stages according to the power level, which helps protect battery life\n\nIt is generally recommended to keep the default settings

Scene will perform speed changes at different times based on your selection. The specific differences are as follows

Reduce speed: only reset the charging speed when the charger is connected and the battery percentage changes
Accelerate charging: When the battery status changes, the charger is connected Reset the charging speed every second
Charging to death: Based on the logic of [Charging Acceleration], the charging speed is automatically reset every second
Charging should be shown as a positive number and discharging as a negative number

The application data backup function currently provided requires the system to integrate busybox and toybox, use tar+gz to compress data (if the system supports it, pigz will be used to increase the compression speed), and only back up data under "/data/data/application package name" , and does not guarantee compatibility with all systems and applications. \n\nThe application backup file is in /sdcard/backups/apps (Android 11+ system does not support the backup function)
Please do not enter special symbols for model information! \nCompatible with the model code of the [Application Variable] module, copy it and reopen this window to use it!

After modification, you can click "Restore" -> "Confirm" to restore the model before modification. Uninstalling Scene will cause the backup model information to be lost. Please be sure to restore and then uninstall! 

Alternatively, you can also restore the model information by re-flashing the complete ROM! 

When using DualBootPatcher multi-system software, do not use this function to modify the model! ! !
This feature does not support your device yet!
Automatically hide status bar and navigation bar

Disable the real-time blur effect of the Flyme6 pull-down notification center to reduce the lag in the pull-down notification center of Meizu low-end machines when playing games or videos. It may also save power and requires a restart.
MIUI9 go to the notification center to search
The search box in the drop-down notification center of the MIUI9 system is hidden by default and will take effect after restarting.
Customizing the DPI or resolution of the mobile phone may cause the device to fail to start normally or cause UI errors.
By changing the build.prop to disguise the model, some phones may fail to boot or have bugs.
Customize the MAC address of the mobile phone WIFI network card, only supports some devices
Customize the MAC address of the mobile phone WIFI network card, which only supports some devices and is more suitable for Android Q
Compile the application with dex2oat to reduce CPU and RAM usage during runtime. The compilation process may take half an hour, and you need to recompile after the system is updated!

After Android N, in order to reduce application space occupation and improve installation efficiency, dex will no longer be fully compiled when installing applications, resulting in a decrease in running speed. Selecting "Compile" through this function will use the speed mode to compile when installing the application. The installation speed will be significantly slower, but the running time will be smoother (about 20% improvement, no improvement in the game frame rate!). 

Take the Douyu TV client under the Oreo system as an example. The base.odex is only 6.8MB when newly installed, and increases to 103MB after compilation. 

However, many domestic applications use hot update technology, which often requires downloading the latest code from the server and parsing and rendering when running. This is the main reason why these applications start slowly or freeze after startup. Therefore, dex2oat compilation cannot bring significant performance improvements to such applications!
Applicable to Android N+, adjust the dex2oat compilation strategy when installing the PackageManager application. It needs to be reset after updating the system.
Parse wpa_supplicant.conf or WifiConfigStore.xml in the /data/misc/wifi directory

Turning off some options in the Performance Boost Config will prevent the CPU from being frequently pulled up to a higher frequency, causing power consumption. However, leaving the application to start upclocking will slightly reduce the experience. Need to restart!
Turning off SWAP, this may be slow
Note:\nThe higher the value, the more actively SWAP will be used. The impact of this setting on fluency is difficult to perceive. You can adjust it as appropriate~
Description: ZRAM is an implementation of SWAP. When available memory becomes insufficient, some data in memory is compressed. But the CPU will become busy~
ZRAM is in use and the compression algorithm cannot be changed now. \n\nTo make the settings take effect, please click the "Adjust" button below
Use ZRAM after you are done with it

If you can use SWAP normally without turning this item on, there is no need to turn it on. 

You only need to enable this option unless SWAP cannot be started, or the phone crashes after starting SWAP! 

For example: Xiaomi's SDM845 model is on Android 9.0. You need to check this option to use SWAP normally.

Note: Swapfile is similar to Windows virtual memory, and the swap efficiency is limited by disk performance. Do not use this function on mobile phones with small capacity or insufficient space to prevent the flash memory from aging too quickly!
Auto-start at boot (Scene must be allowed to auto-start)
Note: You need to allow Scene to start automatically, and it will take effect next time you turn on the computer!
You have installed the Magisk framework. It is recommended to use the latest version of the add-on module to enhance the reliability of SWAP control. The main functions of the add-on are as follows:
1. Improve the speed of restoring ZRAM and Swapfile settings after restarting the phone
2. Adjust LMK parameters according to the device RAM capacity to enhance background retention capabilities
3. Adjust VM parameters to increase enthusiasm for using ZRAM and Swapfile
After downloading the module, please flash it in Magisk Manager yourself and restart your phone!
The compression rate of ZRAM is usually between 20~45%

Data compression algorithm: %s
Original data size: %s
Compressed size: %s
Physical memory usage: %s
Maximum memory usage: %s
Memory usage limit: %s
Compression Rate: %s

Data compression algorithm: %s
Original data size: %s
Compressed size: %s
Compression rate: %s

ZRAM Writeback
Writeback block: %s
Written back: %dMB
Total reads: %dMB
Total writes back: %dMB

This value specifies how much additional physical memory the Linux kernel will reserve. When there is insufficient memory, it will immediately start compressing memory to SWAP/ZRAM. The device will become noticeably slower before the available memory rises back to a reasonable range\n\nSimply put, the higher the extra_free_kbytes setting If the value is larger, the memory recycling (swap or process killing) will be more active. However, it is not recommended to set it too large to avoid wasting physical memory and increasing the burden on the disk/processor!

The value range is 0~1000, where 1000 means 10%, which means that the three values ​​​​of the memory water level low/min/high differ by 10% (physical RAM capacity). 

For example (my mobile phone):
pageSize=4KB
managed=1951743(pages)
min_free_kbytes=10900(KB)
watermark_scale_factor=500

At this time the min value is
10900(KB)/4( PageSize)=2725(pages)
The low value is about
1951743*5%+2725≈100312(pages)
The high value is about
1951743*10%+2725≈197899(pages)
Note: The final low and high The value may be larger due to the influence of extra_free_kbytes

In this example,
min=2725=10MB
low=100312≈392MB
high=197899≈773MB

It means that the memory will start to be recycled when it is lower than 392M Memory until available memory is higher than 773MB~
The battery is too low, please charge it in time!
Not a single app was selected!
No available schema configuration script found

The app does not come with a performance configuration script for your phone. You can select "Get Script Online" to see if there is a configuration suitable for your phone available for download, or select "Learn More" to view a custom configuration tutorial!
For first time use, select configuration preferences first

Some mobile phones have a dynamic adjustment mechanism for CPU parameters, which will cause customized parameters to quickly become invalid. In addition, temperature control will also restrict you from increasing the CPU frequency.
Please press and hold to select the directory
Please download and install "Scene-Advanced Settings" from Scene, and set it to allow background auto-start!
Syncing Xposed settings from the "Scene-Advanced Settings" component failed!
When installing third-party applications, it will automatically help you click "Next" and "Install"

Automatically clicking the "Skip" button can help you automatically skip some open-screen ads, but it will reduce system performance and cause click delays\n* Only used in Simplified Chinese for better results
Use some button data recorded in the cloud to click the special skip button

Advertising traffic is an important source of income for some software developers/vendors. If you are not very pressed for time, it is recommended that you browse and click on the advertising content you like^_^
Please authorize Scene to "modify system settings" first!
Please authorize Scene to allow "notification usage rights" first!

Scene is an application for gaming enthusiasts. To use it, you need to have excellent eyesight, reading comprehension skills and a good mentality. 

Unforeseen errors may occur during use, resulting in data loss or even failure to boot normally. 

Please be sure not to use it on your mobile phone [for work] or where [important data] is stored to avoid losses! 

During use, be sure to read the prompt information carefully and operate with caution, and do not easily turn on function options you do not understand! 

In addition, the author of this application does not guarantee to provide usage help and fault recovery suggestions!
Please give Scene permission to display floating windows first!

Let Scene automatically adjust LMK parameters based on your RAM capacity to enhance background capabilities (which may cause lags when memory is low). If you need to restore, please turn off this option and restart the phone. If you want to set it automatically after booting, please allow the toolbox to start automatically.
Busybox integrated with Scene does not support your current system. Please download and install Busybox yourself.
For the following applications that have been added to the bias mode, the startup shortcut has been lost or was not created successfully. Do you want to re-create it immediately?
Adding shortcuts in batches may fail. You can long press the application icon to send a single shortcut to the desktop!
√ The icon display status has been switched
You may need to manually delete the added shortcut!
"Read and write local storage" permission is required to use the system wallpaper as the software background
A request to create a shortcut has been sent
Do you want to add "%s" to the desktop for quick use?
This feature does not support adding shortcuts
Requires read and write permissions to external storage
The specified configuration file does not exist or does not have read permission.

Most of Scene's modification operations to the system can now be performed in the form of Magisk modules. However, you must first agree to Scene automatically install additional modules on your phone and restart your phone (recommended)!
Profile not detected, dynamic responses automatically disabled!

Click the menu in the upper right corner, select and edit the temperature control file, and click Save after editing~

Note: As the Android system continues to be updated, it becomes more and more difficult to modify the system partition. The modification may not be saved successfully, or It will be automatically restored after restarting. It is recommended to use the magisk module to complete the temperature control modification! 

The temperature control file is usually in the /system/etc or /vendor/etc directory. The name starts with "thermal" and has the suffix ".conf"
Process Manager is not compatible with your phone yet!
